name: Assata Shakur
known_for: Murder conviction, one of the FBI's "Most Wanted Terrorists", friend of Afeni Shakur and Mutulu Shakur and often described as their son Tupac Shakur's "godmother" or "step-aunt"
allegiance: Black Liberation Army  (1970/1–1981)  Black Panther Party  (1970)
conviction: 1977: First degree murder, second degree murder (later dismissed), atrocious assault and battery, assault and battery against a police officer, assault with a dangerous weapon, assault with intent to kill, illegal possession of a weapon, armed robbery (bank)
